titleStmt.title: The essayes or counsels, ciuill and morall, of Francis Lo. Verulam, Viscount St. Alban
Essays
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Hanna Barret,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with cancel title page printed on blank A1, of the edition with Haviland, Barret, and Richard Whitaker in the imprint.
Identified as STC 1147 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1475-1640" reel 692.
Reproductions of the original in Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reels 618 and 692 (same copy filmed twice).
